expandMap: Expand to see the sensor map
expandAqiGauge: Expand to see information about the selected sensor
expandAqiGraph: Expand to see a graph of the last 24 hours
hideMap: Collapse to hide the sensor map
hideAqiGauge: Collapse to hide information about the selected sensor
hideAqiGraph: Collapse to hide the graph of the last 24 hours
noSensorGraph: Click a sensor to see its data!

offline.heading: This page is not available offline
offline.body: Check your internet connection and go back online to view this page. If you believe you are connected to the internet, refresh your page.
